entry.desc: Predefined ocean diagnostics configurations for various purposes. This variable controls the frequency, precision, and field lists of diagnostics to be outputted. Valid values ordered in increasing intensity: "spinup", "production", "testing", "development". Further specialization of diagnostics may be done by copying an edited version of diag_table file in SourceMods/src.mom/
Version of ocean BGC tunings to use (default values can be overwritten by user_nl_mom and user_nl_marbl). "none" => run without MARBL tracers.
